content: in this court case the court ruled in favor of the plaintiff they made several decisions including opening the succession dissolving the community inheritance annulling a life annuity contract and declaring the nullity of donations made to the defendants the court also assigned exclusive ownership of a property to the plaintiff and ordered the defendants to make payments to the plaintiff the court rejected the procedural exceptions raised by the defendants and discussed claims related to the life annuity contract and current account transactions ruling in favor of the plaintiff the court determined the value of the property and settled the costs of the litigation the final ruling was made by the judgeexaminer in grosseto on december 17 2020
